summary: Willem is a Breton Spellsword that can be found in the Vilemyr Inn in Ivarstead.
descriptionHtml:
[size=2]Willem Thetric is a very simple follower that can be found in the Vilemyr Inn in Ivarstead. He wears standard leather armor and wields a glass sword in one hand and the Fire Bolt spell in the other.

[list][*]light foot perk
[/*]
[*]essential
[/*]
[*]marriable (will open a general goods shop)
[/*]
[*]will tolerate criminal behavior
[/*]
[*]will return to the Vilemyr Inn when you dismiss him
[/*]
[/list][/size][size=2]
Willem should work with or without any DLC. He should also be compatible with any follower mods as long as this mod is loaded before them.

[/size]
author: BananaDongle
